game.name: Angler's Journey
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This cozy clicker demands you battle for every catch, from small fry to mighty bosses. Arm yourself with diverse weapons; unlock powerful skills and constant upgrades to complete your massive fish collection.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This cozy clicker demands you battle for every catch, from small fry to mighty bosses. Arm yourself with diverse weapons; unlock powerful skills and constant upgrades to complete your massive fish collection.
